All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    Action
    Generic Action interface for blackboard architecture.
    ActionGenerator
    Generic interface for Blockboard-style action generators that provide collections of selectable player options.
    ActionInterpreter
    Generic interface for Blackboard-style action interpreters that apply provided player actions on a game instance.
    Board
    Xox specific implementation of the board interface.
    BoardReadOnly
    Read Only board interface for Xox boards.
    DesktopLauncher
    This class is to demo / test the functionality of Xox.
    EndingAnalyzer
    Generic ending analyzer interface.
    LogicException
    Custom Exception that is fired whenever the logic is instructed to handle parameters that semantically are not applicable.
    ModelAccessException
    Custom Exception that is fired whenever model modifications are requested that would lead to an inconsistent state.
    Player
    Encodes minimal information required for launch instructions.
    PlayerReadOnly
    Read only interface for properties of a player, as provided by the LobbyService.
    Ranking
    Represents player scores.
    RankingGenerator
    Custom game specific classes implementing this interface can be applied on a game at any state, to compute the current ranking (scores per player, descending order.)
    XoxActionGenerator
    Analyzes a Xox game and generates a collection of valid actions for a player.
    XoxActionInterpreter
    Business Logic class that applies a Xox Action on a provided Xox model instance.
    XoxClaimFieldAction
    Represents the only kind of blackboard action required in Xox.
    XoxController
    Xox controller with all operations that must be exposed by RESTIFY.
    XoxEndingAnalyzer
    Util class to determine whether a given xox board state implies that the game is ended.
    XoxGame
    Represents the state of a Xox running game.
    XoxGameReadOnly
    Read-only interface for Xox game model
    XoxRankingGenerator
